title: Carrie Underwood posts sweet video of her son Isaiah transformed into a Troll
text:
She may be known for her singing.

But looks like Carrie Underwood's son Isaiah has inherited more of her dancing skills.

The songstress, 36, posted a heartwarming video of her four-year-old bobbing alongside Queen Poppy during their visit to DreamWorks Trolls The Experience in New York City on Sunday.

'He's got his mama's dance moves!' Carrie Underwood posted a heartwarming video of her four-year-old bobbing alongside Queen Poppy during their visit to the DreamWorks Trolls The Experience in New York City on Sunday

The youngster wore a giant Trolls inspired pink wig as he bounced alongside the pink troll.

'He's got his mama's dance moves!' Carrie gushed in the video, along with a dancing and crying laughing emoji.

Carrie and her family enjoyed a fun-filled day experiencing the inner world of Trolls, based off the 2016 animated film starring Justin Timberlake and Anna Kendrick.

The country singer was joined by her husband Mike Fisher, their nine-month-old son Jacob, and of course Isaiah, who got the full Trolls makeover.

Feeling like a queen! Carrie posed alongside Queen Poppy while clad in loose jeans and a flannel top

Let's dance! Young Isaiah was having a blast grooving alongside Poppy

Carrie opted to stay in character as herself for the experience.

The hit-maker wore a red and white flannel shirt, frayed jeans, leather boots, and wore her blonde hair into a top know as she posed beside the pink troll.

Carrie is back on tour, so certainly some time with her family was a welcome change of pace from life on the road.

Music maker: Carrie is back on tour, so certainly some time with her family was a welcome change of pace from life on the road

Fun for the whole family! The youngster wore a giant Trolls inspired pink wig as he bounced alongside Queen Poppy

The songstress will be traveling through the east coast before making her way to Canada next week.

Carrie married hockey star Mike in 2010, and together they share sons Isaiah and James.

The couple recently celebrated nine years of marriage, and Mike marked the special occasion with a touching Instagram tribute.

'9 years feels like 9 minutes!!!! Grateful to be on this journey with you @carrieunderwood!! Time sure does fly.'
description: The songstress, 36, posted a heartwarming video of her four-year-old bobbing along with a giant troll at the DreamWorks Trolls The Experience in New York City.
